column4: How do I get my system to play the sound with a .3gp file ?
if totem can't do it, try VLC
Totem did not like to play it neither MPlayer.
I think they all use ffplay not ?
Totem is gstreamer based by default
VLC will not play it either.
can you play 3gp files with sound ?
the ones from my phone work fine, yeah
Though i paid for the fluendo codecs so maybe that had an impact. I'm using intrepid
I think i'm simply missing a codec even though I see people recompiled ffmpeg in the past to get supprot for .3gp.
I don't need to reboot or something right ?
Try grabbing the ubuntu-restricted-extras package, maybe its in another codec
